bill_title: to provide that a portion of the revenues from the excise tax on motor vehicles be distributed to county, municipal, and township governments.
keywords: Motor Vehicle Registration, License Plates & Fees

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide that a portion of the revenues from the excise tax on motor vehicles be distributed to county, municipal, and township governments. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-5B-17 be amended to read as follows: 32-5B-17. All Two-thirds of the revenues received pursuant to § § 32-5B-1 and 32-5B-20 shall be credited to the state highway fund and one-third of the revenue received pursuant to § § 32-5B-1 and 32-5B-20 shall be credited to the local government highway and bridge fund . 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
